metadata.dc:author: Costa-Casaretto, C
metadata.dc:description: The Faculty of Medicine at the University of Chile was started in 1843. Founding professors included Tomas Armstrong, Guillermo C. Blest, Nataniel Cox, Francisco Javier Tocomal, Juan Blest, Julio Lafargue, Manuel Cortés, Luis Ballester. Further nominations, up to a number of 30, took place from 1843 to 1865, and are listed in this paper.
metadata.dc:title: Lista cronológica de los miembros de la Facultad de Medicina de la Universidad de Chile (1843-1865).
[Chronologic list of the members of the Medical School of the University of Chile (1843-1865)].
